mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW JOIN ORDER_OPTION USING(ORDER_OPTION_CODE) JOIN PRODUCT_ORDER USING(ORDER_CODE) JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION USING(P_OPTION_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(P_NO) WHERE P_NO = #{pNo}

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWN , REVIEW_TABLE.* FROM(SELECT RV.R_NO , RV.R_TITLE , RV.SCORE , RV.OPEN_SIZE , RV.R_CONTENT , RV.R_CREATE_DATE , RV.R_MODIFY_DATE , RV.R_STATUS , RV.ORDER_OPTION_CODE , POP.P_COLOR , POP.P_SIZE , PRODUCT.P_NAME , M.USER_NO , M.ID , M.GENDER , M.HEIGHT , M.WEIGHT , PRODUCT.P_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_LIKE WHERE REVIEW_LIKE.USER_NO = USER_NO AND REVIEW_LIKE.R_NO = RV.R_NO ) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM REVIEW RV LEFT JOIN ORDER_OPTION OOP ON(OOP.ORDER_OPTION_CODE = RV.ORDER_OPTION_CODE) JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION POP ON(OOP.P_OPTION_NO = POP.P_OPTION_NO) JOIN PRODUCT ON(POP.P_NO = PRODUCT.P_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_ORDER POR ON(OOP.ORDER_CODE = POR.ORDER_CODE) JOIN MEMBER M ON(POR.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE POP.P_NO = #{ pNo } ORDER BY R_NO DESC) REVIEW_TABLE) WHERE ROWN BETWEEN #{ startRow } AND #{endRow}

SELECT RV.R_NO , RV.R_TITLE , RV.SCORE , RV.OPEN_SIZE , RV.R_CONTENT , RV.R_CREATE_DATE , RV.R_MODIFY_DATE , RV.R_STATUS , RV.ORDER_OPTION_CODE , POP.P_COLOR , POP.P_SIZE , PRODUCT.P_NAME , M.USER_NO , M.ID , M.GENDER , M.HEIGHT , M.WEIGHT , PRODUCT.P_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_LIKE WHERE REVIEW_LIKE.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND REVIEW_LIKE.R_NO = RV.R_NO ) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM REVIEW RV LEFT JOIN ORDER_OPTION OOP ON(OOP.ORDER_OPTION_CODE = RV.ORDER_OPTION_CODE) JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION POP ON(OOP.P_OPTION_NO = POP.P_OPTION_NO) JOIN PRODUCT ON(POP.P_NO = PRODUCT.P_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_ORDER POR ON(OOP.ORDER_CODE = POR.ORDER_CODE) JOIN MEMBER M ON(POR.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE RV.R_NO = #{rNo}
